The second part of The dialogue concerning the practical use of infant-baptism wherein many things dubiously expressed in the former part are satisfactorily cleared ... / by the same authour. Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.
109, [1] p.
Printed by T. Maxey, for John Rothwel ..., London : 1656.
Errata: p. [1] at end. Attributed to Ford by Wing. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Includes bibliographical references.
